transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji kaun?
Executive: Ji hi good evening Rajesh ji baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Hi Rajesh ji actually main Naveen baat kar raha tha team India Mart se kaise.
Hm hm.
Executive: Sir ji kal aap se meri baat hui thi Krishna interior ko leke jahan aapne ek by lead mujhe batai thi jahan pe customer ne apni requirement deny kiya tha sir Rohit Mishra ke haan haan.
Hm hm.
Executive: Yes sir to kal maine wo lead apne team se review karai thi sir.
Hm hm.
Executive: Aur team ka feedback hamare paas dobara aaya hai sir us lead ke regarding haan unhone ye cheez boli hai sir ki lead jo post hui hai sir wo as per process hui hai unhone shayad buyer se dobara connect bhi kiya tha hm aur waha pe jo requirement post hui thi buyer ke end se wo whatsapp se confirmation leke ki gayi thi matlab whatsapp pe hum ek confirmation bhejte hain buyer ko haan haan ki aapko ye requirement aapne ye post ki thi aapko ye requirement chahiye ki nahi chahiye to wo yes pe click kiya hai buyer ne.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Uske baad wo lead post hui thi sir.
Customer: Theek theek.
Executive: Yes sir to socha aapko bata doon.
Customer: Theek hai. Main aapse main aapse kal morning mein baat karta hun abhi main thoda busy hun. Iske bare mein aapse morning mein baat karunga.
Executive: Theek hai to sir abhi ye feedback mein
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a buylead with denied requirement.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that lead was posted as per process.

- Buyer confirmed requirement via WhatsApp before posting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss the feedback in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, process, whatsapp
